column1: Your staff was incredibly rude when I called yesterday. This is unacceptable.
The event last week was poorly organized. The venue was too small and there wasn't enough food.
I'm done with this organization. Please remove me from all mailing lists and do not contact me again.
After this experience, I will no longer be supporting the alumni association.
I've decided to end my monthly donations. The service has been terrible.
Can you help me with my donation receipt?
